name: Simtech Development
description:
Our purpose
We are a technology partner providing exceptional digital experience for you and your customers. 
Whatever you are a retailer, B2B company or retail chain, our expertise allows to meet any of your IT needs. 
With our covering all digital touchpoints, you will extend the borders of your business, foster customer engagement, and fit their evolving needs.
 
Who we are?
Simtech Development has been working in the market of custom ecommerce development starting from 2005. Since then we have completed lots of projects - marketplaces, online malls, corporate websites, startup’s online stores - and we are proud of each of them.
Our team serves clients across the whole world - United States, Australia, Switzerland, Germany, Russia, and more than 170 other countries. 
High-performing teamwork of 50+ in-house developers, managers, QA and DevOp specialists shows a stable result - over 95 percent client satisfaction.
 
Our expertise
Strategy and Roadmap, Analytics, Process Improvement, Interface Design, Security, Development, Data Migration, Integration, Cloud Hosting, Custom App Development, Mobile.
 
Your benefits
Automation of business process
Overall control in one place
Scalable and flexible solutions
Constant interaction with consumers
Business diversification
Availability across all channels
Keeping competitive edge
